name: sendbetteremail
description: 1. Install/update [Flow Base Components](https://unofficialsf.com/introducing-flowbasecomponents "Flow Base Components").  This is a firm pre-requisite. 2. Install the latest package found at [Send Rich Email (Send Better Email Action)](https://unofficialsf.com/send-rich-email-with-the-new-sendhtmlemail-action/).
